kw.msg: ElementClickInterceptedException: Message: Element <a class="emotion-qkxlua-SignInLink e1n5ufv34" href="/client/login?opts=0&target=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.s.dev.barrons.com%2Farticles%2Fbuy-rockwell-automation-stock-pick-price-cc120733%3Fmod%3Dstock_picks_lp"> is not clickable at point (1218,52) because another element <iframe id="offer_e8bf39fa83d181fea949-0" name="offer_e8bf39fa83d181fea949-0" src="https://piano.vx.barrons.com/checkout/template/cacheableShow?aid=bcO5aY6Spu&templateId=OTM64SCFC1O5&templateVariantId=OTVBVRG67IPH0&offerId=fakeOfferId&experienceId=EXSXIZXH3Z7G&iframeId=offer_e8bf39fa83d181fea949-0&displayMode=inline&pianoIdUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fpiano.auth.barrons.com%2Fid%2F&widget=template&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.s.dev.barrons.com%2Farticles%2Fbuy-rockwell-automation-stock-pick-price-cc120733"> obscures it Stacktrace: RemoteError@chrome://remote/content/shared/RemoteError.sys.mjs:8:8 WebDriverError@chrome://remote/content/shared/webdriver/Errors.sys.mjs:197:5 ElementClickInterceptedError@chrome://remote/content/shared/webdriver/Errors.sys.mjs:342:5 webdriverClickElement@chrome://remote/content/marionette/interaction.sys.mjs:177:11 interaction.clickElement@chrome://remote/content/marionette/interaction.sys.mjs:136:11 clickElement@chrome://remote/content/marionette/actors/MarionetteCommandsChild.sys.mjs:344:29 receiveMessage@chrome://remote/content/marionette/actors/MarionetteCommandsChild.sys.mjs:220:31
